projectDescription: React component for displaying well-optimized images from Sanity.io easily
keyFeatures: Automatic srcSet generation with dynamic multipliers
Native lazy loading with low-quality image previews
Automatic width and height attributes to prevent layout shifts
Support for Sanity crop and hotspot data
Tiny 4kb bundle size with zero dependencies
publicApiSurface: SanityImage - Main React component for rendering images
ImageWithPreview - Component for rendering images with preview
buildSrc - Function to build image src URL
buildSrcSet - Function to build image srcSet
parseImageId - Utility to parse Sanity image ID
assetId - Utility to get asset ID from image
normalizeAssetId - Utility to normalize asset ID format
